select
distinct
from DW_XX
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.sql: DWID, DWMC, SSQX, DWDM, DWLX, LSGX, HYDM, JBR, JCR,JCRQ, JC, CXJC, JCJG, MEMO
mapper.select:
select MXMC from DM_MX where DMLBID ='10101010' AND DMMXID in
#{jcid}
select JCID,XM,JCR,JCRQ,JCJG,MEMO,CXJC from JC_JG where DWID = #{dwid} order by XM ASC
mapper.update:
update JC_JG
JCR = #{jcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JCRQ = #{jcrq,jdbcType=DATE},
JCJG = #{jcjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XM = #{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CXJC = #{cxjc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where JCID=#{jcid}
mapper.select: SELECT xx.DWID,xx.DWMC,xx.DWDM,xx.SSQX,xx.DJZH,zj.ZJRQ,zj.BZ MEMO, (case when zj.XZDM = '01' then '养老' else null end) yl, (case when zj.XZDM = '02' then '失业' else null end) sy, (case when zj.XZDM = '04' then '工伤' else null end) gs, (case when zj.XZDM = '06' then '养老机关' else null end) jgyl, zj.JBR from DW_ZJ zj LEFT JOIN DW_XX xx ON zj.DWID = XX.DWID WHERE xx.DWID = #{dwid}
